messages.message: Did the Docs chatbot recently get updated? This (https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/apps/187900cc-8937-4fd5-9209-528879f51aa0) was the one I had bookmarked and this (https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/apps/0686b7fe-c04c-42ea-ab3f-4c940abc1baa) is the one from the marketplace. If it was updated, is there a way to redirect/maintain the first one so it still works?

It does get updated with each release which changes the app ID (what’s in the URLs you bookmarked). You can always get to the latest version from the app name-based URL: https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/apps/shared/Instabase/Explore%20AIHub%20Docs
For about three days the other week we had the app ID version of the URL linked on the docs page to deal with a bug in redirects, so our apologies if you saved the link then :sweat_smile:
Ah okay! I just go to the app itself and add bookmark from the url there so that's why I save the app ID version of the URL I guess.

In theory chatbots redirect you to the latest version regardless of which version you open, but the docs chatbot I think might be a special case because it’s published differently than user-created chatbots.

@Balaram @avi Is there any way to ensure old docsbot links redirect to latest, since users might be doing the same thing and just saving the current browser URL? Or maybe a way to have the docsbot’s browser URL be the app name version of the URL?

@david.lee Thanks for the feedback.

*Quick context:* 
Commercial chatbot - Shareable URL will be based on the ID of the chatbot (https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/apps/0686b7fe-c04c-42ea-ab3f-4c940abc1baa)
Community chatbot - Shareable URL will be based on the name and owner of the chatbot (https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/apps/shared/Instabase/Explore%20AIHub%20Docs)

For commercial chatbots, since the URL changes with every revision we have enabled automatic redirection to the newer version of the chatbot. In case of community chatbot, since the URL won't change the automatic redirection was not enabled.

However we are observing this pattern, the name based URL (for community chatbot) is getting resolved to ID based URL and the users are bookmarking the same from the browser. I am creating a ticket to track this request and enable automatic redirection for community chatbots.

https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-3203 cc: @avi @margaret.tomaszczuk
